titles.title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that signatures on discharge petitions be made public immediately.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 7/22/1993--Introduced. Amends rule XXVII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to require the Clerk of the House to provide a current list of the names of all Members of the House who sign a motion to discharge a committee from the consideration of a public bill or resolution. Requires such petition to be made available for public inspection during normal working hours.
